column5: Yeah, I'm the exact same way, but I can't stop now

Yeah, my newer ones fluctuate colour a lot based on temperature, but as they get older, they stay pretty much the same no matter the temp or physical activity. Massaging them every day just with some baby lotion seemed to help mine

I think I read about 18 months, but it depends on the scar itself as well. Like if it's a keloid or healed badly

I'm Freddie and I prefer they them pronouns.

I'm 16 and I live in the Midwest in the USA

I'm here because I am asexual and questioning if I am aro as well

I like to bake, listen to music, read, and watch scary movies

I like music from all genres (I'm always looking for new music, so if you have any suggestions I'd love to hear them). I like psychological thrillers and horror movies.

My aesthetic is anything dark and comfy

I'm looking forward to spending time with my dog this weekend and baking some delicious food.
Thank you!
That made my day, thank you!
same... every week i say: this time it'll be different, and it never is. i feel you

It's okay. You are a human being and you deserve to take care of yourself and be happy. I know it probably doesn't mean much coming from a stranger, but I believe in you. Please take care of yourself. It's okay to eat, it's okay to take care of yourself. You can do this.
